snippet.title: Enzyme and graft combo restores lung function after spinal injury
snippet.description: ...Until the last few decades, it was generally thought that damage to the spinal cord was permanent, as the nerves within our vertebrae stubbornly resist regrowing severed connections after injuries. But a number of studies have helped us understand why exactly it is that the nerves refuse to grow, raising the prospect that we could use this knowledge to intervene and help repair damage to the spin...

snippet.title: HBO cuts the cord, brings streaming-only service to Europe
snippet.description: ...An HBO streaming service that does not require an associated cable subscription is coming in mid-October, according to Variety. The rollout is confined to only a few European countries, but it's an embrace from Time Warner to cord-cutters that non-HBO customers have long sought. The service...

snippet.title: Live sports keep people from cutting cable cord
snippet.description: ...Cord-cutters are no threat to the subscription TV industry as long as sports fans are around.
